title: Fix transparent grave card overlay issue

requirements.summary: Add opaque background to GraveDetailCard modal to prevent underlying content from showing through
acceptanceCriteria: When clicking on a grave tile in the map view, the detail card displays with a fully opaque background
When clicking on a grave in the search results, the detail card displays with a fully opaque background
No text or elements from the underlying page are visible through the card
The card content (grave location, status, deceased persons) is clearly readable without transparency issues

file_operations.description: Modify the DialogContent component to include a fully opaque background class. Add 'bg-background' or 'bg-white dark:bg-slate-900' class to ensure the modal has a solid backdrop that completely blocks visibility of underlying content. Verify that the Dialog overlay also has sufficient opacity to prevent content bleed-through.
